Name: Fujiwara Bittersweet
About the game: Fujiwara Bittersweet is a GxB Otome/Visual Novel, slice of life, with cute but somehow dark theme. Story 'Aya just moved to a new little town near the mountains. Her new life as a high school freshman begins now, join her as she navigates through life and meets new people. Will she make friends or perhapsâ€¦ find herself falling in love?' TW: /!\ R16+ due to death, swearing, drugs, possible sexual (mostly sex jokes, the other 'sexual' stuff is more flirt and touching than anything) content and other sensitive subjects /!\ Features Free! ~270,000 words ~ more than 45,000 words by route 6 unique routes with two endings each Happy Ends for everyone (Friend and Sweet)! ~+15 CGs Original sprites/BGs GAMEPLAY NOTES You can earn Friend or Sweet points when encoutering a choice during the story, which will lead you to one route or another. Recommended order to follow the routes: Ikki (clover leaf) Toshio (cigarettes) Yuta (headphones) Haru (bracelet) Kenji (keychain) Ryu (herbal tea) Characters CREDITS Art & Story : Karamelow Editing & Proofreading : Giazg, Vesper, Akatea, YoshiBB & Fairfaxlease Music : Alyx (TiberAlyx)
